name: multiverse
description: A furystack-based microservice and microfrontend collection
author: Gallay Lajos <gallay.lajos@gmail.com>

scripts.build: yarn build:common && yarn build:workers && yarn build:services && yarn build:frontends
scripts.start:pm2: yarn build:common && yarn build:workers && yarn build:services && yarn pm2 start ecosystem.config.js
scripts.test:cypress: yarn workspace @service/auth seed && yarn start:pm2 && concurrently --kill-others "yarn workspace @frontend/core start" "yarn cypress run" --success first
scripts.start: yarn build:common && yarn build:workers && yarn build:services && concurrently --kill-others "yarn workspace @worker/media-encoder start" "yarn workspace @service/auth start" "yarn workspace @service/diag start" "yarn workspace @service/media start"  "yarn workspace @service/xpense start" "npx serve -n -p 8080 -s ./frontends/core/bundle/"
scripts.clean: rimraf services/**/dist frontends/**/dist frontends/**/bundle common/**/dist **/tsconfig.tsbuildinfo tsconfig.tsbuildinfo
scripts.recreate-schemas:auth: yarn workspace @common/models ts-json-schema-generator -p src/auth/*.ts -e all -o src/json-schemas-auth.json
scripts.recreate-schemas:dashboard: yarn workspace @common/models ts-json-schema-generator -p src/dashboard/*.ts -e all -o src/json-schemas-dashboard.json
scripts.recreate-schemas:diag: yarn workspace @common/models ts-json-schema-generator -p src/diag/*.ts -e all -o src/json-schemas-diag.json
scripts.recreate-schemas:media: yarn workspace @common/models ts-json-schema-generator -p src/media/*.ts -e all -o src/json-schemas-media.json
scripts.recreate-schemas:xpense: yarn workspace @common/models ts-json-schema-generator -p src/xpense/*.ts -e all -o src/json-schemas-xpense.json
scripts.recreate-schemas: yarn recreate-schemas:auth && yarn recreate-schemas:dashboard && yarn recreate-schemas:diag && yarn recreate-schemas:media && yarn recreate-schemas:xpense
scripts.dockerize: yarn docker:base && yarn docker:auth && yarn docker:diag && yarn docker:dashboard && yarn docker:media && yarn docker_xpense
